title: Comparing Heights
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Waaah, this sunflower is so big, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>You're right! Ah, hey, Chika-chan, can you try standing next to the sunflower for a minute?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Next to it? Umm, like around here?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah! ....Fufu, the sunflower is just a tiny bit taller than you, Chika-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I lost to a sunflower!? That's kind of frustrating....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Then, Ayumu-chan, try standing here too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Our heights are only 2 centimeters apart, Chika-chan, so I don't think it would make that much of a difference.... How is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>No, Ayumu-chan, you're taller than the sunflower!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eh, really? ....Ah, I think it's because I'm wearing sandals with heels today. The 5 centimeters from these probably helped.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeeh~, that's not fair~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
